overview: FINAL LINE-UP Audible – Matt Ogens and Geoff McLean, USA, 39 min. When We Were Bullies – Jay Rosenblatt, USA/Germany, 36 min. Three Songs for Benazir – Elizabeth Mirzaei and Gulistan Mirzaei, Afghanistan, 22 min. Lead Me Home – Pedro Kos and Jon Shenk, USA, 39 min. The Queen of Basketball – Ben Proudfoot, USA, 22 min.
title: 2022 Oscar Nominated Short Films- Documentary
